basics.label: Web & Mobile Developer
basics.name: Matthew Jones
basics.summary: Six years experience building for the web & mobile.

work.summary: Cash Live is a free, daily, real-time poker game anyone can play.
highlights: Early stage role. Successfully navigating ambiguity.
Built a custom CMS for admininstrative users.
Built a real-time GRPC dashboard for the game server.
Worked as part of a small team of fully remote developers.

work.summary: Empathy Games for High School Kids. launched out of StartED Incubator at NYU.
highlights: Inception role. Contributed to product design and brand positioning.
Lead a small, remote team of developers.
Built multiple game servers and game clients using Javascript-based tech stacks (in conjunction with AWS)
Database modeling backed by MongoDB and DynamoDB.

work.summary: Klue is competitive business intelligence for sales professionals.
highlights: Built an embedded Salesforce application that interfaced with the Klue API.
Built a proxy server in Node to handle Salesforce authentication.
Build various client-facing product features, including product onboarding.
Lead the transition from the Browserify to Webpack, E2E testing with Cypress
Keen contributor to documentation, knowledge shares

work.summary: Creative web design and development for an advertising/digital agency.
highlights: Experience building high performance web apps, websites, and static pages using React.
Pushed the boundaries of performance, theme architecture, and client/user expectation.
Basic iOS app experience with React Native.

work.summary: Search engine optimization and content marketing for the gaming industry.
highlights: Primary copywriter on email marketing campaigns netting millions in revenue.
Heavy emphasis on technical ability and knowledge of web technology (hacks).
Proven and repeatable search engine optimization success for valuable keywords.
Conversion rate optimization for landing pages receiving 30k+ monthly visits.
Solo designed and built many websites.

work.summary: Copywriter and digital marketer with a focus on international audiences.
highlights: Prolific blogger and content marketing strategist.
Web development for teachaway.com and satellite properties.
Landing page conversion rate optimization and search engine optimization.
Responsible for rapid growth on Facebook by utilizing 'content gates'.

work.summary: Copywriter in a technical role, helping to build out the emails and webpages.
highlights: Lead copywriting for blogs, long form content, and press releases.
Basic web development for website, blog, and HTML newsletters/emails.
Proven sucess with search engine marketing and optimization campaigns.
